duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead a team of retail associates, fostering collaboration and guiding their efforts towards providing a 5-star experience for customers.
Explain product offerings and guide customers through the process, ensuring a high level of service across all service channels.
Use technology to create 3D scans of customer's teeth for review by Licensed Dental Professionals, and provide guidance on payment plans.
Collaborate with dental partners to drive patient referrals and grow the book of business.
Manage the operational aspects of the SmileShop, setting expectations, monitoring compliance, and achieving desired goals.
Provide complimentary whitening and guidance on dental care to customers, creating a positive and high-energy atmosphere.
Plan and lead initiatives to drive sales and operations, including scheduling, training, and preparing reports.
Act as a brand ambassador, forming genuine relationships with on-site Partner Network Practice Team Members and alerting Leadership of potential conflicts or concerns.
Additional responsibilities as needed to set the SmileShop up for success.

education_certification.credential: Sales and Customer Service experience, preferably in a retail sales setting
